import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Observable } from 'rxjs'; import { User } from '../user/user'; import { UserService } from '../user/user.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-header', templateUrl: './header.component.html', styleUrls: ['./header.component.css'], }) export class HeaderComponent { user$: Observable; constructor(userService: UserService) { this.user$ = userService.getUser(); } }
